name: Leopard Fleece Ruffle Scarf
description:
This stylish scarf will keep you warm and toasty throughout the entire fall and winter!

Also available in select sports teams and other prints or even solid colors.

name: Pink/Green Bird Half Apron
description:
This little half apron will help you sing your way through the kitchen and help you hit all the right notes while cooking up your favorite goodies!

The skirt is covered in pastel pink, green, and blue birds and the edges are trimmed in blue.  It is topped with a wide blue waistband and faux apron with pastel pink rick-rack.  There are also 2 large hidden pockets, one on each side.

This apron is made from all cotton materials. One size fits most and the ties are extra long to fit a variety of sizes.. Hand-wash or machine wash on gentle cycle. Air dry or tumble dry on low heat.

name: Navy Floral Hipster
description:
This handy little purse is to be worn across your body and hangs on your hip...hence the name Hipster!  Its deep navy background and combination of pretty flowers in pink, blue, and orange will make you feel like spring all year round! 

There are several varieties of either large print floral or small print floral or even one with blue hearts. Each one is lined in coordinating fabric of blue hearts, green vine on navy, or pink loops on navy.

This bag is large enough to hold whatever small essentials you may need on-the-go and keeps you hands-free!

Its made from all cotton fabrics in a smoke-free, pet-free home!

options.name: large navy floral with blue hearts liner
large navy floral with green vine liner
blue hearts with pink loop liner
small navy floral with pink loops liner
small navy floral with green vine liner

name: Happy Birthday Banner
description:
Use this bright and colorful banner to decorate a room or a party, use as part of your window treatment or just to brighten up a wall.

Each pennant is made from floral cotton fabric in bright pinks, greens, brown and yellow and is topped with cheery yellow grosgrain ribbon.

Check out our other shop on Etsy.com to see other varieties of banners or to request a custom order!

name: Shower Curtain Beach Bags
description:
Its a reversible beach bag lined with a plastic shower curtain!! If you're off to the beach or hanging at the pool, you never need to worry about your wet clothes or towels ruining your favorite bag!

This beach bag is extra large and it completely reversible! The outside is made of canvas fabric and the inside is made from environmentally-friendly PEVA plastic shower curtains.  There is one large coordinating pocket on the inside and outside and the bag is finished off with two sturdy long handles.

Its stylish, colorful, and practical!! You know you want one!
